title: Nautilus' Q shows anchor before TU
body: Title. Whenever you throw your Q, I've noticed the nachor shown as the projectile is the one he used to carry before the texture update. Just a heads in case you haven't noticed, I assume we want to keep all the visuals on the same page, right?

replies.body: Nice catch man. It's probably because they didn't update the particle effects when they did the TU.
Olaf, Ori, and Graggas have the same problems
why does naut look like shit
Low model settings, Bad screenshot quality, you pick.
meh 70% of these TU are making them look exclusively worse. I've stopped spending money on RP since then. Half my skins look like shit now.

Maybe change his anchor back to the old one? 

Now that we have a better idea of the overall visuals of the new summoners rift and new LoL art style, I think the old anchor wouldn't be out of place, and imo it looks more like a big metal hook and much more interesting.
I kinda want Nautilus' model anchor to be changed to be darker along with his suit.
